CompanyService - Class in org.jb.chaim.CouponSystemProjectWeb

convertDate() - Method in class org.jb.chaim.CouponSystemProjectWeb.WebDate
This is the method that converting the date from string to java date.
couponsByPrice(double) - Method in class org.jb.chaim.CouponSystemProjectWeb.CustomerService
This method role is to return the customer coupons filtered up to the price that recived from the client.
couponsByType(String) - Method in class org.jb.chaim.CouponSystemProjectWeb.CustomerService
This method role is to return the customer coupons filtered according the type that recived from the client.
createCompany(Company) - Method in class org.jb.chaim.CouponSystemProjectWeb.AdminService
The role fo this method is to recive a Company object from the client side and send it to the data base to create process
createCoupon(FakeCoupon) - Method in class org.jb.chaim.CouponSystemProjectWeb.CompanyService
This method role is to create a coupon in the data base by using the FakeCoupon class to make sure all fields are accepted without error.
